title: Blended Teaching Method-Based Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic nursing knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducting projects that integrate theory and practice in an online environment for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% understanding of basic nursing theory within four weeks using online lecture videos and multimedia
Learners improve practical problem-solving skills by 70% through weekly activity-based learning (case analysis, simulations)
Learners apply three or more work-related stress management strategies after completing a wellness education module
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
